Name: Starlight  Sapphire Lv.3
Description: Through Gemcrafting, raw ore can be processed into a higher-level Sapphire.
Description2$english: A rare raw stone grown in Regnus, with deep blue dark patterns containing the power of the Abyssal. It surges, rages, and etches. racing like a beast, swift like a silent thunder. Even the deeply buried bedrock quietly changes under its erosion.
